thread.title: Karen Pence Says She’s ‘Never Met Anyone Who Has More Compassion for Women’ Than Mike Pence
thread.title_full: Karen Pence Says She’s ‘Never Met Anyone Who Has More Compassion for Women’ Than Mike Pence

author: Gabriella Paiella
title: Karen Pence Says She’s ‘Never Met Anyone Who Has More Compassion for Women’ Than Mike Pence
text:
On Friday, Vice-President Mike Pence became the highest-ranking U.S. official to ever speak at the March for Life, a gathering of anti-abortion activists that occurs annually in Washington, D.C., close to the anniversary of Roe v. Wade .

Before his speech, Pence’s wife Karen Pence — who... More »
